pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: e GTX 880M, AMD Radeon R9 Series, or similar
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
